mapper.select: select memberid,membername,memberage,delyn,writeday,membertype from member1234 order by memberType asc

SELECT m.memberName, m.memberPhone, r.rentPlace, b.bikeType, b.bikeCode, e.errorDay, e.errorContent FROM rent1234 r JOIN member1234 m ON m.midx = r.midx JOIN bike1234 b ON b.bkidx = r.bkidx JOIN error1234 e ON e.ridx = r.ridx
SELECT * FROM bike1234 WHERE bkidx BETWEEN 1 AND 10
